snippet: After a hurricane upended the schedule at the Republican National Convention in Tampa, Fla., Democrats are facing storms where President Obama is set to accept the nomination in an outdoor stadium on Thursday.
abstract: After a hurricane upended the schedule at the Republican National Convention in Tampa, Fla., Democrats are facing storms where President Obama is set to accept the nomination in an outdoor stadium on Thursday.

headline.main: In Charlotte, as in Tampa, the Weather Becomes a Worry
headline.print_headline: Gray Skies Worry Democrats Eager for Smooth Convention
